testcase.name: Spiegel plus read audio section articles
testcase.system-out: Given I start Spiegel.......................................................passed Then I click Akzeptieren und weiter.........................................passed Then I click SpiegelPlus....................................................passed Then I scroll to "audio" section............................................passed Then I click first article of "audio" section...............................passed Then I click page down 3....................................................passed Then I go back to "Plus - DER SPIEGEL"......................................passed Then I click a random article of "audio" section............................passed Then I click page down 3....................................................passed Then I go back to "Plus - DER SPIEGEL"......................................passed
